member.name: T:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions
member.summary: Couchbase related extensions.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GenKey(Couchbase.Core.IBucket)
member.summary: Generates a globally unique document key.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.IsTransientStatus(Couchbase.IO.ResponseStatus,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a Couchbase response status code should be considered a transient error.
member.param: Indicates whether the operation has replication or persistance constraints.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.VerifySuccess(Couchbase.IOperationResult,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Throws an exception if an operation was not successful.
member.param: Indicates whether the operation has replication or persistance constraints.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.VerifySuccess``1(Couchbase.IOperationResult{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Throws an exception if an operation was not successful.
member.param: Indicates whether the operation has replication or persistance constraints.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.VerifySuccess``1(Couchbase.IDocumentResult{``0},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Throws an exception if a document operation was not successful.
member.param: Indicates whether the operation has replication or persistance constraints.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.VerifySuccess``1(Couchbase.N1QL.IQueryResult{``0})
member.summary: Throws an exception if a query operation was not successful.
member.exception: Thrown if the error is potentially transient and the operation should be retried.

remarks.para:
This method is similar to the built-in Couchbase
method, but may be better for many situations for these reasons:

list.item:
This method includes information about the specific errors detected.
only returns a generic Fatal Error message and expects you to examine the property in your code. This methods does that for you by including the errors in the exception message so that that they will be included in any diagnostic logging your doing without any additional effort.
This method throws a if the error indicates that it should be retried. This makes it easy to use a Neon to perform retries.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.CheckAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket)
member.summary: Performs small read/query operations to verify that the database connection is healthy.
member.exception: Thrown if the bucket is not ready.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.WaitUntilReadyAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Waits until the bucket is ready.
member.param: Optionally specifies the maximum time to wait (defaults to 60 seconds).
member.exception: Thrown if the operation timed out.

summary.para: Waits for any pending database updates to be indexed. This can be used to implement read your own writes..
summary.note: IMPORTANT: This is intended for use only for databases with a #primary index.

summary.para: Waits for any pending database updates to be indexed. This can be used to implement read your own writes..
summary.note: IMPORTANT: This is intended for use only for databases with a #primary index.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.AppendSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Appends a byte array to a key, throwing an exception on failures.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.AppendAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Appends a string to a key, throwing an exception on failures.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.DecrementSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Decrements the value of a key by one. If the key doesn't exist, it will be created and initialized to . This method will throw an exception on failures.
member.param: The amount to decrement by (defaults to 1).
The initial value to use if the key doesn't already exist (defaults to 1).

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ExistsSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for the existence of a key, throwing an exception on failures.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.FindSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to retrieve a key value, returning null if it doesn't exist rather than throwing an exception.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.FindDocumentSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String)
member.summary: Attemps to retrieve a document, returning null if it doesn't exist rather than throwing an exception.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetAndLockSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets a key and locks it for a specified time period.
member.param: The interval after which the document will be locked. This defaults to 15 seconds and the maximum supported by the server is 30 seconds.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetAndTouchSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets a key and updates its expiry with a new value.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetAndTouchDocumentSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets a document and updates its expiry with a new value.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a key value from the database, throwing an exception if the key does not exist or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetDocumentSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Gets a document, throwing an exception if the document does not exist or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetDocumentsSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Gets a set of documents, throwing an exception if any document does not exist or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetFromReplicaSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a key value from a Couchbase replica node, throwing an exception if the key does not exist or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.IncrementSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Increments the value of a key by one. If the key doesn't exist, it will be created and initialized to .
member.param: The amount to increment by (defaults to 1).
The initial value to use if the key doesn't already exist (defaults to 1).

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.InsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts a key, throwing an exception if the key already exists or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.InsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,System.TimeSpan,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts a key with an expiration TTL, throwing an exception if the key already exists or there was another error. Note that 30 seconds is the maximum expiration TTL supported by the server.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.InsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Couchbase.IDocument{``0},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts a document, throwing an exception if the document already exists or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.InsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.Collections.Generic.List{Couchbase.IDocument{``0}},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts multiple documents, throwing an exception if any of the documents already exists or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.InsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts an document, throwing an exception if the document already exists or there was another error.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.InsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,System.TimeSpan,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts an document, with an expiration TTL, throwing an exception if the key already exists or there was another error. Note that 30 seconds is the maximum expiration TTL supported by the server.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.QuerySafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Couchbase.N1QL.IQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a query request, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.QuerySafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a N1QL string query, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.QuerySafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Couchbase.N1QL.IQueryRequest,Couchbase.N1QL.MutationState,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a query request after ensuring that the indexes have caught up to the specified mutation state, throwing an exception if there were any errors.
member.param: Specifies the required index mutation state that must be satisfied before the query will be executed.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.QuerySafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,Couchbase.N1QL.MutationState,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes a N1QL string query, after ensuring that the indexes have caught up to the specified mutation state, throwing an exception if there were any errors.
member.param: Specifies the required index mutation state that must be satisfied before the query will be executed.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.RemoveSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Couchbase.IDocument{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Removes a document throwning an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.RemoveSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.Collections.Generic.List{Couchbase.IDocument{System.Threading.Tasks.Task}},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Removes multiple documents, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.RemoveSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Removes a key, throwning an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.RemoveSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Neon.Data.IPersistableType,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Removes an document, throwning an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ReplaceSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Couchbase.IDocument{``0},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Replaces an existing document, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ReplaceSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.Collections.Generic.List{Couchbase.IDocument{``0}},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Replaces multiple documents, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ReplaceSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Replaces a key value, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ReplaceSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,System.Nullable{System.UInt64},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Replaces a key value, optionally specifying a CAS value and throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ReplaceSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Removes an document, throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ReplaceSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,System.Nullable{System.UInt64},System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Removes an document, optionally specifying a CAS value and throwing an exception if there were any errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.TouchSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Touches a key and updates its expiry, throwing an exception if there were errors.
member.param: Specifies the time span for which the document will remain in the database without being deleted.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.TouchSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Neon.Data.IPersistableType,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Touches an document and updates its expiry, throwing an exception if there were errors.
member.param: Specifies the time span for which the document will remain in the database without being deleted.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UnlockSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Unlocks a key, throwing an exception if there were errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UnlockSafeAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Neon.Data.IPersistableType,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Unlocks an document, throwing an exception if there were errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Couchbase.IDocument{``0},Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates a document, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates a key, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates an document, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,System.UInt64,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates a key using a CAS, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,System.UInt64,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Upserts an document, using a CAS, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,System.TimeSpan,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates a key setting an expiration, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,System.TimeSpan,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates an document, setting an expiration and throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,``0,System.UInt64,System.TimeSpan,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates a key using a CAS and setting an expiration, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.UpsertSafeAsync``1(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,``0,System.UInt64,System.TimeSpan,Couchbase.ReplicateTo,Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Inserts or updates an document, using a CAS and setting an expiration, throwing an exception if there are errors.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.ListIndexesAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket)
member.summary: Lists the indexes for the test bucket.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.GetIndexAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about a named Couchbase index for the test bucket.
member.returns: The index information as a dynamic or null if the index doesn't exist.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.WaitForIndexAsync(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Waits for a named index to enter a specific state (defaults to online).
member.param: Optionally specifies the desire state (defaults to online).

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.OpenCluster(Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a Couchbase cluster connection using specified settings and the username and password.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.OpenCluster(Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings,Neon.Common.Credentials)
member.summary: Returns a Couchbase cluster connection using specified settings and .

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.OpenBucket(Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings,System.String,System.String,System.TimeSpan,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a Couchbase bucket connection using specified settings and the cluster credentials.
member.param: Optionally configure the bucket to ignore durability parameters.
member.exception: Thrown if the bucket is not ready after waiting .

remarks.para: You may explicitly pass =true for development and test environments where there may not be enough cluster nodes to satisfy durability constraints. If this is null (the default) then the bucket will look for the presence of the DEV_WORKSTATION environment variable and ignore durability constraints if this variable exists, otherwise durability constraints will be honored.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseExtensions.OpenBucket(Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings,Neon.Common.Credentials,System.TimeSpan,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns a Couchbase bucket connection using specified settings and credentials.
member.param: Optionally configure the bucket to ignore durability parameters.

remarks.para: You may explicitly pass =true for development and test environments where there may not be enough cluster nodes to satisfy durability constraints. If this is null (the default) then the bucket will look for the presence of the DEV_WORKSTATION environment variable and ignore durability constraints if this variable exists, otherwise durability constraints will be honored.

member.summary: Couchbase helper utilities.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseHelper.Literal(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a Couchbase literal suitable for direct inclusion into a Couchbase query string. This handles any required quoting and character escaping.

remarks.note: The string returned will always be surrounded by single quotes.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseHelper.LiteralName(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into a Couchbase name suitable for direct inclusion into a Couchbase statement. This handles any required quoting and character escaping.

remarks.note: The name returned will always be surrounded by single back tick marks.

member.summary: Returns true if the exception passed should be considered to be a potentially transient Couchbase error.
member.returns: true if the error was potentially transient.

member.name: M:Couchbase.CouchbaseTransientDetector.IsCasTransient(System.Exception)
member.summary: Returns true if the exception passed should be considered to be a CAS (check-and-set) error that could be retried in application code.
member.returns: true if the error was potentially transient.

member.name: P:Couchbase.EntitySerializer.DeserializationOptions

member.name: T:Couchbase.NeonBucket
member.summary: Wraps an adding some additional capabilities.

remarks.para: This bucket can be configured to ignore replicate and persist durability constraints. You can explicitly pass ignoreDurability=true to the constructor for development and test environments where there may not be enough cluster nodes to satisfy durability constraints. If this is null (the default) then the bucket will look for the presence of the DEV_WORKSTATION environment variable and ignore durability constraints if this variable exists.

This means that production and staging environments that don't have the DEV_WORKSTATION environment variable will enforce durability by default and development/test environments that have this set will not enforce durability be default.

member.name: P:Couchbase.NeonBucket.ReadyTimeout
member.summary: HACk: Returns the timeout used when ensuring that a bucket is ready for use.

member.name: P:Couchbase.NeonBucket.ReadyRetry
member.summary: HACk: Returns the retry policy used when ensuring that a bucket is ready for use.

member.name: M:Couchbase.NeonBucket.#ctor(Couchbase.Core.IBucket,Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings,System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Optionally configure the bucket to ignore durability parameters.

remarks.para: You may explicitly pass =true for development and test environments where there may not be enough cluster nodes to satisfy durability constraints. If this is null (the default) then the bucket will look for the presence of the DEV_WORKSTATION environment variable and ignore durability constraints if this variable exists, otherwise durability constraints will be honored.

member.name: P:Couchbase.NeonBucket.IgnoreDurability
member.summary: Indicates whether this bucket is ignoring any and/or durability constraints. This is useful for unit testing where it'll be likely that there won't be enough Couchbase cluster nodes to satisfy durability constraints for production code.

member.name: M:Couchbase.NeonBucket.Adjust(Couchbase.ReplicateTo)
member.summary: Adjusts a parameter based on the bucket's durability mode.

member.name: M:Couchbase.NeonBucket.Adjust(Couchbase.PersistTo)
member.summary: Adjusts a parameter based on the bucket's durability mode.

member.name: M:Couchbase.NeonBucket.SetInternalBucket(Couchbase.Core.IBucket)
member.summary: INTERNAL USE ONLY: This is used in special situations where the internal backing bucket needs to be replaced. This is currently used within the Couchbase test fixture.
member.param: The bucket to be set or null.

member.name: M:Couchbase.NeonBucket.GetInternalBucket
member.summary: INTERNAL USE ONLY: Returns the internal bucket.

member.summary: Handles persisting JSON documents to Couchbase.

member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: Action invoked when an error is encountered.
Optionally specifies the first #MONO_INCR# key (defaults to 1).
Optionally specify that the class should go through the motions but not actually persist anything.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.CouchbaseImporter.ReportError(System.String)
member.summary: Reports an error.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.CouchbaseImporter.WriteDocument(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Persists a document to Couchbase.

remarks.note: This method will remove any @@key property from the document if present.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseImporter.DocumentCount
member.summary: Returns the number of persisted documents.

member.name: T:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings
member.summary: Settings used to connect a Couchbase client to a Couchbase bucket.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.Parse(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parses a from a JSON or YAML string, automatically detecting the input format.
member.param: Optionally require that all input properties map to route properties.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.#ctor(System.Uri[])
member.summary: Constructs an instance with server URIs.
member.param: Specifies one or more server URIs.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.Servers
member.summary: One or more Couchbase server URIs.
member.remarks: You must specify the URI for at least one operating Couchbase node. The Couchbase client will use this to discover the remaining nodes. It is a best practice to specify multiple nodes in a clustered environment to avoid initial connection problems if any single node is down.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.Bucket
member.summary: Optionally specifies the name of the target Couchbase bucket.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.ConnectTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (milliseconds) to wait to establish a server connection (defaults to 10 seconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.SendTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (milliseconds) to wait to transmit a server request (defaults to 10 seconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.OperationTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (milliseconds) to wait for an operation to complete (defaults to 10 seconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.QueryRequestTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (milliseconds) to wait for a non-view query to complete (defaults to 75 seconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.ViewRequestTimeout
member.summary: Maximum time (milliseconds) to wait for a view query to complete (defaults to 75 seconds).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.MaxPoolConnections
member.summary: Maximum number of pooled connections to a server bucket (defaults to 5).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.MinPoolConnections
member.summary: Minimum number of pooled connections to a server bucket (defaults to 2).

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.UseEnhancedDurability
member.summary: Enables the use of the index consistency option. Both of these options are deprecated as of Couchbase 5.0 so this may no longer matter. This defaults to true.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.CouchbaseSettings.IsValid
member.summary: Returns true if the settings are valid.

member.name: T:Neon.Data.EntityHelper
member.summary: Helper methods for managing database entities.

member.name: T:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.EntityPropertyInfo
member.summary: Holds information about an entity's property.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.EntityPropertyInfo.Properties
member.summary: The list of public properties as serialized to JSON.

member.name: P:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.EntityPropertyInfo.Select
member.summary: The comma separated property names suitable for using in a N1QL select statement.

member.name: F:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.entityProperties
member.summary: Caches the entity properties defined for an .

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.CreateUuid
member.summary: Generates a URI-safe globally unique ID.

remarks.note: The value returned is a converted to base-64 and then made URI safe by replacing "=" characters with "-" and "/" to "_" and also removing any "=" padding charcters.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.GetEntityRef(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the entity reference from an entity key.

remarks.para: This implements a common convention where Couchbase entities are persisted using a key formed by appending entity ID to the entity type, separated by a double colon ("::"). This makes entity types available for filtering when managing cross datacenter replication.
This method extracts the string after the first ("::") as the document ID.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.GetEntityKey(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates an entity key from the entity reference and entity type.
member.exception: Thrown if is null or empty.

remarks.para: Stoke follows a common convention where Couchbase entities are persisted using a key formed by appending entity reference to the entity type, separated by a double colon ("::"). This makes entity types available for filtering when managing cross datacenter replication.
This method concatenates the entity type and ID using a ("::") separator.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.GetEntityKey(System.String)
member.summary: Generates an entity key from the a GUID and entity type.

remarks.para: Stoke follows a common convention where Couchbase entities are persisted using a key formed by appending entity ID to the entity type, separated by a double colon ("::"). This makes entity types available for filtering when managing cross datacenter replication.
This method concatenates the entity type and ID using a ("::") separator.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.ToCouchbase(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Serializes a into the standard format used for persisting to Couchbase.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.ToCouchbase(System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Serializes a into the standard format used for persisting to Couchbase.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.GetEntityPropertyInfo``1
member.summary: Returns the serializable property information for an entity.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.GetEntityProperties``1
member.summary: Returns the names of an entity's properties that will be serialized to JSON.

remarks.para: This method is handy when manually building N1QL query strings when you want to return all entity fields but you don't want to use select * because this nests each result into a property named for the bucket. I'm not entirely sure why Couchbase does this.
remarks.note: This method will include all public entity properties that do not have the and this also honors the property names specified by any attributes.

member.name: M:Neon.Data.EntityHelper.GetEntitySelectProperties``1
member.summary: Returns the comma separated names of an entity's properties in a form where they can be easily added to a manually created N1QL statement.
member.returns: The comma separated list of of property names.

remarks.para: This method is handy when manually building N1QL query strings when you want to return all entity fields but you don't want to use select * because this nests each result into a property named for the bucket. You may use the result to replace the star (*) in the select with the explicit property names.
remarks.note: This method will include all public entity properties that do not have the and this also honors the property names specified by any attributes.
